title: The Hole in the Sky
description: Lured by the entry in her mother's old diary, Kaela Neuleaf enlists the help of her cousin Shawn to understand the message her mother left behind before she died. When an unusual visitor appears and transports them to a land ensnared in a terrible curse - a curse that only Kaela can break - her mother's words become all too real.
author: Barbara A. Mahler
